column2: He who knows (the Tao) does not (care to) speak (about it); he who is (ever ready to) speak about it does not know it.
column3: He who knows (the Tao) does not (care to) speak (about it); he who is (ever ready to) speak about it does not know it.

column2: Therefore a sage has said, 'I will do nothing (of purpose), and the people will be transformed of themselves; I will be fond of keeping still, and the people will of themselves become correct.
column3: Therefore a sage has said, 'I will do nothing (of purpose), and the people will be transformed of themselves; I will be fond of keeping still, and the people will of themselves become correct.

column2: Misery!--happiness is to be found by its side!
column3: Misery!--happiness is to be found by its side!
